      • getGroups

        public java.util.List<Group> getGroups(int n)
        Returns a list of the n Groups that the member is most active in, sorted on title. Measure most active by the total questions posted and answers provided, in total. If there are not n groups, then return the groups that exist.
        Parameters:
        n - number of items to return
        Returns:
        List
